snippet.title: Micro Machines: Mini Challenge Mayhem Pre-Alpha Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Relive the golden days of adolescence, racing Micro Machines around tracks, but using the power of VR to bring otherwise impossible courses, stunts and speed to life. 

Micro Machines: Mini Challenge Mayhem starts its tiny engines on VR platforms to be announced soon!

Learn more: https://www.wimogames.com/ 
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/wimo_games
